data.meta_description: Sylvester SmithSprints - College best: 200m: 22.68 (3/30/2024) 400m: 50.39 (5/10/2024) Freshman (2023) Outdoor: Did not compete Indoor: Competed in the UAB V...
data.text:
College best:

200m: 22.68 (3/30/2024)

400m: 50.39 (5/10/2024)

Freshman (2023)

Outdoor: Did not compete

Indoor: Competed in the UAB Vulcan Invitational... Finished third in the 4x400-meter relay... Set a college best in the 200-meter with a time of 23.16 for 14th place

High School: Attended Pike Road High School… Won the 4x400-meter relay 5a championship in 2022… Holds Pike Road HS records in 100-meter (10.65), 200-meter (21.82) and 400-meter (47.22)… Finished runner-up in the District 5a Championship

Personal: Full name is Sylvester Sylando Smith III… Born on April 18, 2004, in New Orleans, La… Son of Sylvester Smith Jr. and Antionique Smith… Member of the Mu Alpha Theta National Honor Society
